NOTICE OF DEALER PROGRAM FUND ADJUSTMENT
(Date)
{!Contact.Name}
{!Account.Name}
{!Account.BillingStreet},
{!Account.BillingCity}, {!Account.BillingState} {!Account.BillingPostalCode} Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We are writing to inform you that we have erroneously credited the bonus for 2H 2012 performance in your Dealer Program Fund (DPFund) amounting to $_________ last January ______(date of accrual) 2013.
Upon reviewing your account and the metrics that are required to hit the bonus, namely “Bonus for Meeting the 6 Month Revenue Target”, “Bonus for Meeting All Tier Requirements” and “Bonus for SunPower Co-Marketing”, {!Account.Name} did not meet the requirements for _________(Tier) and should not have received the DPFund accrual for the said period.
With this, please expect an adjustment to your DPFund on __________(adjustment date) and please accept our sincere apologies for this error.
If you have questions related to your status as a (Tier) dealer, please feel free to email us at Channel.Development@sunpowercorp.com. We are more than willing to help you with your concerns. Sincerely,
Theo Ludwick
North America Residential Channel Manager
